questions.promptMd: What is the PRIMARY benefit of storyboarding a deck with slide headlines before drafting content?

answers.contentMd: Forces a coherent narrative and prioritization under constraints
Replaces the need for stakeholder review
answers.feedbackMd: Storyboards invite early review, not replace it.

questions.promptMd: True or False: Stakeholder feedback on the storyboard is more efficient than comments on a polished draft.
questions.rationaleMd: Fast iteration at the right fidelity.

answers.feedbackMd: Correct. Low‑fidelity review reduces sunk costs and churn.

questions.promptMd: Which constraint MOST improves storyboarding quality?

answers.contentMd: A hard slide/time limit that forces prioritization
Unlimited slides to cover every angle

questions.promptMd: True or False: An outline for a memo should list section headings and bullet claims before prose.

answers.feedbackMd: Prose first wastes cycles when structure changes.
